name: Hanakanmuri ○
description:
■ Side-scrolling action game
An action game made by Flash that advances while calming the enemy with the action "courtesy".
Operate characters with cute voices to clear various gimmicks.
When the physical strength is lost, an event such as insult occurs.
Go ahead and you'll find a story that complements them.

■ The number of enemy monsters and the number of items are both 40 or more.
Instead of just attacking, there are also small movements and sometimes naughty blame,
Neither action nor animation is a bonus.
Collected items can be stored in the warehouse and can be collected.

■ Plenty of stories, events, and game stages
You can save not only for each stage, but also retry from the current position to reduce stress.
Moreover, troublesome stories can be easily skipped. There is also a difficulty setting.
If you use "Open Mode", you can enjoy all the game over events and CG from the beginning.
